泠字的基本解释

泠
líng
清凉：泠风。泠泠（ａ．形容清凉；ｂ．形容声音清越）。
姓。
古同“零”，凋零。

泠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［líng］
［《廣韻》郎丁切，平青，來。］
亦作“澪1”。
(1)轻妙貌。参见“泠然”。
(2)清凉；冷清。
(3)晓喻。
(4)了解，觉悟。
(5)象声词。亦形容声音清越。
(6)通“零”。滴落。
(7)通“伶”。参见“泠人”。
(8)水名。潇水上源之一。源出湖南省宁远县西南，西北流注入潇水。参阅北魏郦道元《水经注·湘水》。
(9)水名。渭水下游支流之一。又名零水。参阅北魏郦道元《水经注·渭水三》。
(10)水名。指泠溪水。在广东省乐昌县境。参阅清顾祖禹《读史方舆纪要·广东三·韶州府》。
(11)古邑名。
(12)姓。周有泠州鸠。见《左传·昭公二十一年》。

泠字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　泠； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页617第06
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?郞丁切，音靈。水名。【說文】水出丹陽宛陵，西北入江。　又關中有泠水。【水經注】泠水，出浮胏山。　又零陵有泠水。【水經注】泠水，南出九疑山，北流經泠道縣。　又桂陽曲江縣有泠水。【水經注】泠水出泠君山。　又淸泠，水名。【張衡·西京賦】耕父揚光於淸泠之淵。【註】在南陽西鄂山上。　又三江之水曰三泠。　又泠泠，水聲。【古樂府】山溜何泠泠。　又風聲。【宋玉·風賦】淸淸泠泠，愈病析酲。【莊子·逍遙遊】御風而行，泠然善也。　又音聲洋溢曰泠泠。【陸機·文賦】音泠泠而盈耳。　又泠風，和風，所以成穀也。【呂氏春秋辨士篇】師爲泠風。　又邑名。【左傳·哀二十五年】將適泠。又麊泠，漢縣名，屬交趾郡。泠道，亦漢縣名，屬零陵郡。　又與伶通。【左傳·成九年】晉侯見鐘儀，問其族，曰：泠人也。【正義】泠氏世掌樂官而善，故後世名樂官爲伶官。　又【集韻】朗鼎切，音笭。水貌。　又靈年切，音蓮。毛長總結也。【周禮·天官·內饔】羊泠毛而毳羶。【註】泠音靈，徐邈音朗年反。

泠字的源字形

泠字的起名意思

：指清凉或声音清越。形容轻妙的样子。

Ling
Basic explanation of words
Ling
líng
Cool: cool wind. Ling Ling (a. Describes coolness; b. Describes clear voice).
name.
The ancients are "zero" and withered.
Ling
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［líng］
["Guangyun" Lang Dingqie, Pingqing, come. ]
Also known as "Miao 1".
(1) Light and beautiful appearance. See "Ling Ran".
(2) Cool; deserted.
(3) Xiaoyu.
(4) Understand and realize.
(5) Onomatopoeia. Also described as clear and clear voice.
(6) Pass "zero". Dripping.
(7) Through "Ling". See "ling people".
(8) Water name. One of the source of Xiaoshui River. It originates from the southwest of Ningyuan County, Hunan Province, and flows into Xiaoshui from the northwest. See Li Daoyuan of the Northern Wei Dynasty "Shui Jing Zhu · Xiang Shui".
(9) Water name. One of the downstream tributaries of the Wei River. Also known as zero water. Refer to Li Daoyuan of the Northern Wei Dynasty, "Shui Jing Zhu · Wei Shui III".
(10) The name of the water. Refers to Lingxi Water. In Lechang County, Guangdong Province. Refer to Qing Gu Zuyu's "Minutes of Reading History and Fangyu·Guangdong San·Shaozhou Prefecture".
(11) The name of the ancient town.
(12) Last name. Zhou has Lingzhou dove. See "Twenty-one Years of Zuo Zhuan · Zhao Gong".
Ling
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Water Word Department] 　 Ling; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 617 06
【Tang Yun】【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】? Yin Dingqie, the sound is good. Water name. [Said the text] The water flows out of Danyang Wanling and enters the river in the northwest.　There is Lingshui in Guanzhong. [Notes on Water Classics] Lingshui, floating out of Shanshan.　There is cold water in Lingling. [Notes on Water Classics] Lingshui flows out of Jiuyi Mountain in the south and flows through Lingdao County in the north.　There is Lingshui in Qujiang County, Guiyang. [Notes on Water Classics] Lingshui flows out of Lingjun Mountain.　Yang Ling, the name of the water. [Zhang Heng·Xijing Fu] The farmer's father raised light in the abyss of Cheongling. [Note] On the Xi'e Mountain in Nanyang.　The water of the three rivers is called Sanling.　 Ling Ling again, the sound of water. [Ancient Music House] Mountain slips He Lingling.　The sound of wind again. 【Song Yu·Feng Fu】Qing Lingling, healing and analysing 酲. [Zhuangzi·Xiaoyaoyou] Walking in the wind, it is kind.　The voice filled with voice and said Ling Ling. [Lu Ji·Wen Fu] The sound is lingering and full of ears.　It's cool and gentle, so it's a valley. [Liu Shi Chunqiu Distinguishing Scholars] The teacher is Ling Feng.　Also known as the town. [Twenty-five years of Zuo Zhuan·Ai] Jiang Shiling. Also Lingling, the name of Han County, belongs to Jiaozhi County. Lingdao, also the name of Han county, belongs to Lingling County.　And Lingtong again. [Zuo Zhuan·Cheng Jiu Nian] The Marquis of Jin saw Zhong Yi and asked his family, saying: Ling Ren Ye. [Justice] The Ling family was good at holding music officials, so later generations named music officials were acting officials.　[Jiyun] Lang Ding cut, sound 笭. Water appearance.　It's a new year, Yinlian. The hair length is also summed up. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Inner Food】Sheep has cold hair and mutton. [Note] Ling Yin Ling, Xu Miao Yin Lang Nian.

Ling
Name meaning
: Refers to cool or clear voice. Describe the delicate look.
líng
I прил./наречие
1) лёгкий, парящий, воздушный; легко, свободно
2) нежный, мелодичный (о звуке); нежно, мелодично
3) длинный и завитой (о волосах, шерсти), курчавый
II звукоподражание журчанию ручья
журчать
III гл.
вм. 零 (падать, капать)
IV собств.
1) Лин (фамилия)
2) геогр. (сокр. вм. 零水) Линшуй (река; а) в пров. Шэньси; б) в пров. Гуандун)
